ModMetaData.author: PizzaPolice
ModMetaData.name: [1.4] Emergency Stabilizer
ModMetaData.description:
Adds an implant that forces a pawn into a cryptosleep-like state when they reach critical condition, giving you more time to stop bleeding or respond to time-sensitve trauma.
Primarily meant for animals, so you don't have to play Trauma Team on Emergency mode every time your tank animals get downed. It has a number of cognitive consequences when you use it on a sapient pawn.
Flavor text by Saito Yui.
